Title: Afraid To Be Cool / Raise Me Up
Description: ["Music videos for Miyavi's four-track album ", Afraid To Be Cool / Raise Me Up, '. A thirty-second animated teaser for the album was released in April, featuring a sample of ', Raise Me Up, '. In May, a music video for the short version of ', Afraid To Be Cool, ' was released with a similar style, but featuring original animation. The non-remixed songs were later included on his "Fire Bird" album.']
